statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_data;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_data;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE transaction_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_id, transaction_count FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY block_id DESC;
SELECT block_hash, transaction_count FROM blockchain_data WHERE transaction_count > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, transaction_count FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_id BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_hash LIKE '%a1b2c3%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC, transaction_count ASC;
SELECT block_id, timestamp FROM blockchain_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-07-01' AND transaction_count > 50 ORDER BY block_id ASC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_number = 100;
SELECT block_number, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_data WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, transaction_amount FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_number BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date = '2022-02-15';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_number, transaction_id, sender_address FROM blockchain_data WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, transaction_amount FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_number = 1000;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_number = 500;
SELECT block_number, transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM blockchain_data WHERE sender_address = '0x7a1788f3C7A9e7b5aD63AD6fEd04E89e40077Bb9' ORDER BY block_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT block_id, miner_address FROM blockchain_data WHERE transaction_count > 5;
SELECT receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT block_id, timestamp, transaction_count FROM blockchain_data WHERE miner_address = '0xabcDEF' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM block_miners ORDER BY block_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT block_id, timestamp, miner_address FROM blockchain_data WHERE transaction_count > 100;
SELECT b.block_id, b.timestamp, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM blockchain_data b JOIN transactions t ON b.block_id = t.block_id GROUP BY b.block_id ORDER BY num_transactions DESC;

SELECT b.timestamp, b.transaction_count, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM blockchain_data b LEFT JOIN transactions t ON b.block_id = t.block_id GROUP BY b.timestamp, b.transaction_count ORDER BY num_transactions ASC;

SELECT b.block_id, b.timestamp, COUNT(bm.miner_id) AS num_blocks_miner FROM blockchain_data b JOIN block_miners bm ON b.miner_address = bm.miner_address GROUP BY b.block_id ORDER BY num_blocks_miner DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, transactions FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_id = 10;
SELECT receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT address, balance FROM addresses WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM blocks WHERE miner_address = '0x0123456789abcdef' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY block_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT block_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_data WHERE transactions > 10 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, COUNT(transactions) AS num_transactions FROM blockchain_data GROUP BY block_id ORDER BY num_transactions DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY sender_address, receiver_address HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT block_id, num_transactions, miner_address, timestamp FROM blocks WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM BlockchainData ORDER BY block_number DESC;
SELECT transaction_hash, timestamp FROM BlockchainData WHERE transaction_count > 10;
SELECT block_number, miner_address FROM Blocks WHERE block_number BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransactionsHistory WHERE sender_address = '0x123456789' AND receiver_address = '0xabcdef123' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM BlockchainData WHERE block_number = 100;
SELECT block_number, transaction_hash FROM BlockchainData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MIN(block_number) AS min_block_number, MAX(block_number) AS max_block_number FROM Blocks;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, block_number FROM TransactionsHistory WHERE sender_address = 'Alice' OR receiver_address = 'Bob';
